Maurice Kanbar Institute of Film and Television News
Maurice Kanbar Institute of Film and Television News

Blog for the Maurice Kanbar Institute of Film and Television. Posts include information on events, film screenings and festivals, job opportunities, production grants, scholarships, alumni news, call for entries in festivals and other contests, and departmental announcements. The blog dates back to July 2011. The captures of the blog from 2016-2019 do not contain any content.
